amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that changes to a credit card agreement which reduce a customer's interest rate or other fees can be implemented immediately, instead of being subject to the 45-day waiting period required under the CARD Act of 2009.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 111-326 to clarify that changes to a credit card agreement that reduce a customer's interest rate or other fees can be implemented immediately, instead of being subject to the 45-day waiting period required under the CARD Act of 2009.
